name: eACH_PLATINUM
displayName: We'll make a breakthrough eventually... And see what truth these Walls are hiding.
description: Acquired all trophies.

name: eACH_STORY_MODE_TRAINING_MVP
displayName: Don't worry... Just keep training.
description: Got selected as the top performer during training in Episode 1 of the Story Mode prologue.

name: eACH_STORY_MODE_CLEAR_CHAPTER_1
displayName: This first step will be a big one for the human race.
description: Completed Story Mode Chapter 1.

name: eACH_STORY_MODE_CLEAR_CHAPTER_2
displayName: What is it that you see?
description: Completed Story Mode Chapter 2.

name: eACH_STORY_MODE_CLEAR_CHAPTER_3
displayName: What do you expect? The world is a cruel place.
description: Completed Story Mode Chapter 3.

name: eACH_STORY_MODE_CLEAR_CHAPTER_4
displayName: Live a life that you can be proud of.
description: Completed Story Mode Chapter 4.

name: eACH_STORY_MODE_CLEAR_CHAPTER_5
displayName: I'll wrap that around you as many times as you want.
description: Completed Story Mode Chapter 5.

name: eACH_STORY_MODE_CLEAR_CHAPTER_LAST
displayName: He was a soldier who fought to the very end.
description: Completed the final chapter in Story Mode.

name: eACH_SURVEY_OPERATION_CLEAR_25_PERCENT
displayName: There's still so much I need to find out about the world.
description: Completed 25% or more of the Scout Missions in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_SURVEY_OPERATION_CLEAR_50_PERCENT
displayName: What must be done.
description: Completed 50% or more of the Scout Missions in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_SURVEY_OPERATION_CLEAR_100_PERCENT
displayName: I'll be the one to hunt those Titans to extinction!
description: Completed all Scout Missions in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_GET_EVALUATE_S_ONE_EPISODE
displayName: We've got a talented one here.
description: Achieved a Battle Rating of S in any episode.

name: eACH_GET_EVALUATE_S_ALL_STORY_MODE_EPISODES
displayName: If you don't fight, you can't win.
description: Achieved a Battle Rating of S in all Story Mode episodes.

name: eACH_KILL_EX_BOSS_FIRST_TIME
displayName: It's huge! What the heck is it?
description: Completed your first Dire Elimination.

name: eACH_KILL_EX_BOSS_ALL_STORY_MODE_EPISODES
displayName: I'm gonna destroy them! Every last one that's on this earth!
description: Completed all Story Mode Dire Eliminations.

name: eACH_GALLERY_UNLOCK_25_PERCENT
displayName: We're always at an information disadvantage against the Titans.
description: Reached 25% gallery completion in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_GALLERY_UNLOCK_50_PERCENT
displayName: If you don't know about something, you just have to learn it.
description: Reached 50% gallery completion in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_GALLERY_UNLOCK_100_PERCENT
displayName: The outside world must be a hundred times bigger than inside the Walls!
description: ched 100% gallery completion in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_HERO_LEVEL_MAX
displayName: Hmm... Not bad...
description: Leveled the protagonist to max level in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_ONE_CHARACTER_RANK_MAX
displayName: Sorry, buddy, but I'm just a natural.
description: Leveled one character to max rank in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_ALL_CHARACTERS_PLAYABLE
displayName: Devote your heart!
description: Unlocked all characters in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_ASSAULT_ATTACK_FIRST_TIME
displayName: This attack will be the final blow!
description: Successfully completed a Sneak Attack.

name: eACH_HOOK_DRIVE_FIRST_TIME
displayName: I'm the deliverer of death!
description: Eliminated a Titan with the Hook Drive.

name: eACH_BUDDY_ACTION_FIRST_TIME
displayName: I know we can win this if we work together!
description: Used a Buddy Action.

name: eACH_RESCUE_COMPANION_100_TIMES
displayName: I'm just glad it didn't turn out any worse...
description: Saved 100 or more comrades.

name: eACH_EVADE_TITAN_ATTACK_100_TIMES
displayName: I was able to control myself perfectly.
description: Avoided 100 Titan attacks.

name: eACH_KILL_COUNT_TITAN_1000
displayName: More... Must kill more...
description: Eliminated a total of 1,000 enemies.

name: eACH_BREAK_TITAN_PARTS_2000
displayName: My specialty is tearing through flesh.
description: Got 2,000 total body part destructions.

name: eACH_LINK_COMPANION_100_TIMES
displayName: This is a true salute!
description: Had over 100 allies join.

name: eACH_DEAD_COMPANION_100_TIMES
displayName: This world has always been a living hell.
description: Had over 100 allies die.

name: eACH_CLEAR_SUB_MISSION_100_TIMES
displayName: It's great to have something you could put your life on the line for...
description: Completed 100 Side Missions.

name: eACH_BUILD_FACILITY_100_TIMES
displayName: Avoid unfavorable battles.
description: Built 100 bases in battle.

name: eACH_FRIENDSHIP_RANK_INC_FIRST_TIME
displayName: No need to hold back.
description: Increased friendship rank.

name: eACH_FRIENDSHIP_RANK_MAX_ONE_CHARACTER
displayName: Don't be stupid. I've always been talkative.
description: Leveled one character to max friendship in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_FRIENDSHIP_RANK_MAX_ALL_CHARACTERS
displayName: It's not so bad, being a goddess and all.
description: Leveled all characters to max friendship in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_SEND_PRESENT_50_TIMES
displayName: You mind if I take that?
description: Sent 50 gifts.

name: eACH_USE_FREEDOM_WINGS_MARK_1000_TIMES
displayName: As long as we keep fighting, we've still got a chance.
description: Used 1,000 Wings of Freedom.

name: eACH_USE_MONEY_100000
displayName: Just shut your mouths and invest everything in me!
description: Used more than 100,000 RegimC40ent Funds in total.

name: eACH_ALL_TRAINING_GROWTH_MAX
displayName: No matter what you train in, it will serve humanity some day.
description: Maxed out all training levels in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

name: eACH_TITAN_LABO_LEVEL_MAX
displayName: Well, you see... It's just seething with rage!
description: Maxed out the Titan Research Room level in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.
